  • Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp24.app

    • Class nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp24.app.App

      class App extends JFrame implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • closeLevel
          Runnable closeLevel
          Holds the logic that should be run to clean up no longer needed elements of the window.
        • currentDeltaTime
          float currentDeltaTime
          Holds current delta time (duh).
        • currentFrameIndex
          int currentFrameIndex
          Holds the current position of the replay player.
        • gameState
          Game gameState
          Is responsible for the simulation of the game. Holds all game relevant information.
        • lastTimeStamp
          Long lastTimeStamp
          Used for delta time calculation.
        • LEVELONE
          String LEVELONE
          Level 1 filename constant.
        • LEVELTWO
          String LEVELTWO
          Level 2 filename constant.
        • modifiedBoundKeys
          List<Integer> modifiedBoundKeys
          Key bindings for modified keys
        • movementInputBuffer
          LinkedList<Game.Direction> movementInputBuffer
          Holds the moves that haven't been executed yet I though this was a good way of keeping the controls simple and preventing a player 'moving diagonally'
        • paused
          boolean paused
          Dictates whether the game or replay should continue simulating.
        • recorder
          Recorder recorder
          Recorder instance. For recording a play-through of a level.
        • renderer
          Renderer renderer
          renderer instance. renderer is used to display the game state and replay.
        • replayBoards
          ArrayList<Cell[][]> replayBoards
          Holds the 'frames' that make up the replay.
        • replaySpeed
          int replaySpeed
          Used to determine the playback speed when watching a replay.
        • unModifiedBoundKeys
          List<Integer> unModifiedBoundKeys
          Key bindings for non-modified keys
        • window
          Container window
          Content pane reference.
        • windowHeight
          int windowHeight
          Preferred height of the window.
        • windowWidth
          int windowWidth
          Preferred width of the window.
